title: Sources: Pitino set to leave Lobos for Xavier job
content: Xavier is expected to hire New Mexico's Richard Pitino as its next head coach, sources told ESPN on Tuesday night.

title: Sanon transferring to St. John's after year at ASU
content: Transfer wing Joson Sanon has committed to St. John's and coach Rick Pitino, he told ESPN. He averaged 11.9 points per game in his one season at Arizona State.

title: Sources: QB Wilson, Giants agree to 1-year deal
content: The Giants and free agent QB Russell Wilson reached agreement on a one-year deal worth up to $21 million, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter. The deal eliminates New York as a potential option this season for Aaron Rodgers.

title: Sources: Diggs, Pats agree on 3-year, $69M deal
content: Stefon Diggs and the New England Patriots reached an agreement on a three-year, $69 million deal that includes $26 million guaranteed.

title: 'Appreciative' Butler returns to Miami; Dubs fall
content: Forward Jimmy Butler returned to Kaseya Center in Miami on Monday night, for the first time since being traded to the Golden State Warriors, but the Heat stole the show in the end, cruising to a 112-86 victory in front of a sellout crowd of 19,897 fans.

title: Ovechkin scores No. 889, now 6 from NHL record
content: Alex Ovechkin scored the 889th goal of his career to move six goals away from breaking Wayne Gretzky's NHL record as he helped the Capitals to a point before the Jets rallied in overtime to secure a 3-2 victory.

title: Lillard out indefinitely due to blood clot in calf
content: Bucks guard Damian Lillard has been diagnosed with deep vein thrombosis in his right calf and is out indefinitely.

title: MLB predictions: From playoffs and World Series to MVPs and Cy Youngs
content: Can the Dodgers repeat? Who will win MVP? Our experts make their predictions for the 2025 baseball season.

title: Season preview: Ranking all 30 teams as baseball returns
content: Whether your team enters Opening Day as a favorite or hoping to be 2025's big surprise, we've got you covered.

title: Paige Bueckers' pursuit: The national championship that keeps getting away
content: Will Paige Bueckers win an elusive NCAA title or become the greatest UConn player to graduate without one?

title: Watkins' devastating injury shakes up women's NCAA tournament landscape
content: JuJu Watkins' torn ACL changes the 2025 women's title race, and the effects could linger into next season.

title: Predicting the women's Sweet 16: The case for and against every team to reach the regional final
content: Why might every Sweet 16 team win its regional semifinal matchup in Birmingham and Spokane? We predict the winners.

title: You can't stop Cooper Flagg: 'He wants to win every possession'
content: Arizona's best chance of defending Duke's star is by limiting him. Here's how -- and why it might not be enough.

content: Once an afterthought, now a real contender for the No. 8 seed. Plus, projections for the rest of the bracket.

title: Top seed Boston College plays with Gaudreaus, Voce close to hearts
content: Three former Eagles died this past summer. The current team hopes to win a national title in their memory.

title: Tannenbaum plays GM for every NFL team in Round 1: Should the Giants still take a QB at No. 3?
content: Mike Tannenbaum puts his GM hat on and makes his own first-round selections. See why he's taking Cam Ward and Ashton Jeanty early.

title: This NFL hopeful was banned by the NCAA in gambling probe -- but could he still have an NFL future?
content: After a big junior college season, and working with Jon Gruden, ex-Iowa State QB Hunter Dekkers believes he's ready for the NFL.

title: The divergent fortunes of U.S.'s Pochettino, Mexico's Aguirre
content: While Mauricio Pochettino's U.S. has yet to lift off, Javier Aguirre's Mexico has already lifted silverware.

title: Bayern star Davies suffers ACL tear in Canada win
content: Bayern Munich defender Alphonso Davies suffered an ACL tear in his right knee while on international duty with Canada and will be out for a long time.

title: Vini: Brazil must reset after Argentina loss
content: Vinícius Júnior has called for Brazil to push the reset button following their alarming 4-1 defeat at Argentina in Tuesday's World Cup qualifier.

title: Brazil humiliated by Argentina in 4-1 WCQ defeat
content: Argentina celebrated their 2026 World Cup berth with a decisive 4-1 victory over Brazil in Tuesday's South American qualifier.

title: Champions Argentina qualify for 2026 World Cup
content: Argentina will get the chance to defend its World Cup title in 2026 after becoming the first South American team to qualify for the tournament in the United States, Canada and Mexico next year.

title: Club World Cup winners to get up to $125m
content: The winners of this year's 32-team Club World Cup to be held in the U.S. will earn up to $125 million, FIFA said on Wednesday.

title: Source: Madrid optimistic over TAA but no deal yet
content: Real Madrid are "very optimistic" about signing Trent Alexander-Arnold on a free transfer this summer, a source told ESPN, although an agreement with the England international has not been finalised.

title: Source: Madrid eye move for Spain starlet Huijsen
content: Real Madrid are considering signing Bournemouth's young centre-back Dean Huijsen for next season, a source has told ESPN.

title: Iran qualifies for 2026 World Cup, Australia close
content: Iran qualified for the 2026 World Cup after Mehdi Taremi scored twice in a 2-2 draw with Uzbekistan on Tuesday.

title: Pain Index: Whose 2025 NCAA tournament loss hurt most?
content: Some losses are understandable; others will haunt us forever. Let's break down the 2025 men's NCAA tournament defeats.

title: WNBA mock draft: Where does USC's Iriafen land after No. 1 Bueckers?
content: Azzi Fudd is returning to UConn, but Kiki Iriafen, Hailey Van Lith and Georgia Amoore have upped their stock ahead of April's WNBA draft.

title: How No. 1 Aaliyah Chavez's decision changes the top 25 recruiting classes
content: No. 1 recruit Aliyah Chavez's commitment boosts Oklahoma from 25th to 15th in the recruiting class rankings.

title: Sources: Tsunoda to replace Lawson for Red Bull in Japan
content: Yuki Tsunoda will replace Red Bull's Liam Lawson at the Japanese Grand Prix, sources have confirmed to ESPN.

title: Mikaela Mayer-Sandy Ryan rivalry explained: All you need to know
content: Ahead of their rematch on Saturday, we look at the Mayer vs. Ryan feud, the paint incident, and more.

title: Can anyone break Sean Brady's grip on welterweight?
content: Here's a look at every weight class to determine the best of the best in UFC, Bellator, PFL and beyond.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal to rival Liverpool for Ajax defender Jorrel Hato
content: Ajax defender Jorrel Hato is a target for Arsenal while Atlético Madrid eye Cristian Romero. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: "Entity Of Concern": India Shreds US Religious Freedom Body Over RAW Demand
content: In a strongly-worded rebuttal, India said today that it is the US religious freedom body USCIRF that should be designated internationally as an "entity of concern" for its repeated "pattern of biased and politically motivated assessments".

title: Kunal Kamra Gets 2nd Summons, Doubles Down With Digs On Nirmala Sitharaman
content: On a day the Mumbai Police sent him a second summons for his comments on Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde, comedian Kunal Kamra posted another satirical song, this time targeting Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman.

title: 'Pray Only To Allah': Mohanlal's Sabarimala Puja For Mammootty Sparks Row
content: A controversy has erupted after superstar Mohanlal offered prayers at Sabarimala for Malayalam star Mammootty earlier this month, with critics pointing out the latter is a Muslim and he must apologise if the 'puja' was done at his instance.

title: "Defectors Needn't Worry...": Revanth Reddy To MLAs Eyeing Congress Switch
content: Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy on Wednesday had a message for BRS MLAs crossing over to the ruling Congress, declaring, "Defectors need not worry... there will be no by-polls".

title: People's Mandate Has Shown Who's Real Traitor: E Shinde On Kunal Kamra Row
content: Hitting out at the Uddhav Thackeray faction of the Shiv Sena over the 'gaddar' (traitor) jibe, Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde has repeated the allegation that its use by Kunal Kamra in a satirical song about him was part of a 'supari

title: "Feel Like Living In Pak": AAP MLA Slams Punjab's Work In Health Sector
content: The Bhagwant Mann government in Punjab was left red-faced in the Assembly after two MLAs of the ruling Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) criticised the state government's work in the health sector

title: Chennai Techie's Wife Called Him "Sex Predator". His "Singapore" Counter
content: A tech entrepreneur, who had accused his estranged wife of harassment amid a bitter divorce and custody battle of their son, has doubled down on his charges.

title: Donald Trump's Big Step Back On Greenland - Usha Vance's Visit Restricted
content: After stirring the hornet's nest in Greenland, Donald Trump has now had to take a step back in US' approach to the semi-autonomous Danish territory.

title: "Indian Businessmen Don't...": Kunal Kamra's Dig At Bhavish Aggarwal
content: Kunal Kamra's stand-up comic show at Mumbai's Habitat studio, which sparked a massive row over his jokes on Shiv Sena chief Eknath Shinde, also featured jibes at Ola founder Bhavish Aggarwal, with whom the comedian has clashed in the past too.

title: Can't Make Students Buy Books From Certain Shops: Delhi Government To Private Schools
content: Schools are prohibited from forcing parents to purchase books, uniforms, or stationery from specific shops or organisations.

title: Beer Bottles Thrown, Punches Fly As Violent Brawl Erupts At South Delhi Bar
content: An eyewitness said that the violent altercation was sparked by a dispute over the DJ's music selection.

title: Bihar Assembly Rejects Proposal To Recommend Bharat Ratna For Lalu Prasad
content: In a setback to the RJD, the Bihar Assembly on Wednesday rejected a proposal to recommend Bharat Ratna, India's highest civilian award, for the veteran leader.

title: Sehwag Tears Into Pant After Ashutosh's Successful Heist: 'That Was Your Job'
content: Rishabh Pant also missed a stumping chance to dismiss tail-ender Mohit Sharma in the final over with DC needing six from as many balls.

title: 16-Year-Old TikTok Star With Over 1 Million Followers Dies In US
content: A 16-year-old US Tiktoker known for his car content has died. According to the New York Post, Joshua Blackledge from North Carolina died at his home on March 18.

title: Indians Bought 10 Maybachs, Worth At Least Rs 3 Crore Each, Per Week In 2024
content: India's luxury market is growing at an all-time high as Maybach sold around ten cars every week in 2024

title: Opinion: Can I Have A 'Non-Sexual' Mascara, Please?
content: Ever tried a blush called 'Orgasm'? Or a mascara that struts its stuff with the moniker, 'Better than Sex'? Sex sells. Brands know that all too well. Even if that means reducing women to mere sex objects.

title: Sonia Gandhi flags non-fulfilment of maternity entitlements under National Food Security Act
content: Congress parliamentary party chairperson drew attention to ‘severely low budgetary allocation’, in violation of ‘the key provision of the NFSA’

title: TTD trusts receive donations worth ₹26.85 crore in nine days
content: Sri Venkateswara Temple Construction Trust gets the highest contribution of ₹11.67 crore, followed by S.V. Annaprasadam Trust with ₹6.14 crore and Sri Balaji Arogya Varaprasadini scheme with ₹4.88 crore among others

title: It has taken 30 years for people to realise my thoughts on tourism are true, says Andhra Pradesh CM Chandrababu Naidu
content: When I said there was no ideology, and tourism was the only ideology that required no expense, the Communists had criticised me then, but a CPI legislator in Telangana Assembly now saw reason in my statement, the Chief Minister observed

title: B. Pharmacy student critical after suicide attempt
content: According to a suicide note left by the victim, she had been in a relationship with a staff of the hospital and accused him of cheating her in the name of marriage

title: Vizhinjam: State to accept Central share of VGF with repayment rider
content: Cabinet meeting decides to accept the Central share of viability gap funding of ₹817.80 crore for the seaport project

title: Mohammed Yunus is rendering religious minority leaders in Bangladesh vulnerable, UN told
content: A rights group said the Chief Advisor of Bangladesh had trivialised the acts of violence against Hindus, Buddhists, and Christians by describing them as outcomes of personal disputes, criminal acts, or accidents

title: Cy-Tb skin test facility inaugurated in Anantapur
content: Anantapur TB Control Officer explains the importance of the test, saying that it is a strategic initiative of the Union government to eradicate tuberculosis via early detection

title: Round table discusses saving Haveri University
content: The meeting has resolved to urge the State govt. to immediately drop the proposal for closure or merger of the university

title: Summer relatively mild in Kerala
content: Though temperature soared above the normal mark in many places in the State in February, it did not set any new records, says IMD Director

title: Tamil Nadu government announces measures to develop amenities and infrastructure in rural areas
content: Minister for Rural Development I. Periyasamy makes a slew of  announcements in the Assembly. Among them are construction of bridges at a cost of ₹800 crore to connect remote villages with schools, colleges, and hospitals, and improvement to water and natural resources at a cost of ₹500 crore

title: Township for Wayanad landslide victims: Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan says State govt focusing on long-term reconstruction and rehabilitation
content: It is a record of sorts that we have been able to take up this project that offers 430 newly built homes in 7 cent plots each, writes Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan

title: TDP, YSRCP cadres clash in Sri Sathya Sai district ahead of MPP elections
content: Tension grips Ramagiri town after activists from both parties resort to attacking one another with sticks and iron rods, resulting in the damage of several vehicles and injuries to people

title: Steps on to secure GI tag for Mankuva cocoa
content: Mankuva cocoa from Idukki has gained global acclaim for its unique quality and has put this small village on the world map of fine chocolate production

title: BJP expels ‘rebel’ leader and BSY baiter Basanagouda Patil Yatnal for six years for indiscipline
content: Yatnal says the party had expelled him ‘for speaking against dynasty politics, corruption and seeking reforms within the party’

content: On completion, it requires 5 MLD water that will be sourced by completing the Tarakarama project, says Ambedkar on the second day of the District Collectors’ conference

title: Executive, Legislature and Judiciary not pitted against each other: Jagdeep Dhankhar
content: His comments come a day after a meeting with all floor leaders to explore parliamentary intervention into judicial appointments

title: Over two lakh devotees throng Suguturu Gangamma Jatara in Punganur
content: The festival enjoys the patronage of the family members of the erstwhile Punganur Zamindars, who came out with donations for the conduct of the jatara in a grand manner

title: A.P. govt. planning to release industrial incentives of ₹3,000 crore in a month, says Minister T.G. Bharat
content: Bharat invites Japanese entrepreneurs to invest in manufacturing, food processing, energy and maritime among other sectors in the State

title: PM Modi to visit Rameswaram temple, inaugurate Pamban bridge amid alliance talks with AIADMK in Tamil Nadu
content: The New Pamban Bridge is India’s first vertical lift railway sea bridge, designed to connect the island of Rameswaram to the mainland

title: FEFKA proposes seven-member committee on film locations to check drug menace
content: Besides the mandatory inclusion of the director and production controller, each committee will have representatives of other departments involved in the filmmaking process.

title: Multi-storey building collapses in Bhadrachalam, several feared trapped under rubble
content: At least four persons were feared trapped under the debris of the building that came crashing down in Bhadrachalam

title: Construction of roads in Bihar not infrastructure development but exploiting its valuable water resources: Kanhaiya Kumar
content: Why are big roads being constructed in Bihar now? It is because Bihar has water resources. Take my words at this press meet that water will be more expensive than petrol (fuel) in future. All the industrialists have their eyes on Bihar’s water resources, says Congress leader Kanhaiya Kumar

title: Over 325 Naxalites killed in Chhattisgarh in one-and-half months: CM Vishnu Deo Sai
content: CM Vishnu Deo Sai said the State has formulated a favourable rehabilitation package for those who surrender

content: Decision taken at talks held by Labour department officials with estate management, workers, and representatives on directions of Labour Minister V. Sivankutty.

title: Banking reform bill lacks digital age safeguards; need deeper scrutiny: Opposition
content: Participating in a discussion on the bill, Harish Beeren (IUML) said the Upper House must ponder over amendments to the five banking laws that are brought at "single stroke"

title: Government gives a leg-up for weavers in Andhra Pradesh
content: In an order, it clears the provision of power free of cost for up to 200 units per month for handloom households and up to 500 units per month for powerloom units in the State

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Unravelling a Maldivian mangrove mystery
content: Cusat researchers uncover causes of mass mangrove dieback in Maldives, recommend restoration measures in international collaboration to help restore the affected species

title: ‘Edappadi’s calculations will be correct’: Velumani on DMK’s word of caution
content: Before winding up his speech in the Assembly, the AIADMK’s Kadambur C. Raju made a reference to Minister Thangam Thennarasu’s cautionary remark last week, about certain ‘calculations’ against the AIADMK warning its electoral rival not to get deceived by certain factors

title: Guntur St. Joseph’s College to host international seminar on psychosocial competencies
content: Delegates from Thailand, Malaysia and Singapore to present research papers at the two-day global meet to be held from March 28 and 29

title: Telangana CM Revanth announces SIT to crack down on online betting app including Rummy
content: The CM said that those found promoting or managing such platforms would face strict legal consequences

title: Efforts under way to revive  Kodumon Rice Mill
content: It is the first rice mill established by a three-tier local body in Kerala. Established at a cost of ₹1.5 crore, the mill was set up in collaboration with the Kodumon panchayat and the Parakkodu block panchayat.

title: Two months before push against Collegium system, International Commission of Jurists report recommended new law for judicial appointments, transfers
content: An international body of jurists had urged the government and the Parliament to enact a law constituting a ‘Judicial Council’ to spearhead judicial appointments and transfers based on transparent, predetermined and objective criteria

title: Yoga teacher 'buried alive' over suspected affair, body found after three months: Police
content: During preliminary investigations, it has emerged that Rajkaran suspected that his wife was having an illicit relationship with the yoga teacher, says SHO Shivaji Colony, Rohtak, Inspector Dilbag Singh

title: Breach of privilege notice moved against Kunal Kamra in Maharashtra Legislative Council
content: Sushma Andhare supported the performance and used objectionable language, which amounts to contempt of the House, says BJP leader Pravin Darekar

title: 74 people pledge to donate bodies to Kakatiya Medical College in Telangana’s Warangal
content: The mortal remains of a single donor can aid in imparting medical lessons to hundreds of future doctors: KMC Principal

title: Continued pattern of biased and politically motivated assessments: India on U.S. Commission Report on religious freedom
content: Ministry of External Affairs spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal said that, “The U.S. Commission on International Religious Freedom’s persistent attempts to misrepresent isolated incidents and cast aspersions on India’s vibrant multicultural society reflect a deliberate agenda rather than a genuine concern for religious freedom”

title: 12,114 self-respect marriages registered in T.N. since 2018: Minister
content: Minister P. Moorthy was responding to Thousand Lights MLA N. Ezhilan, who urged the State government to conduct awareness programmes for sub-registrars regarding self-respect marriages

title: Karnataka Governor returns Greater Bengaluru Governance Bill seeking clarifications
content: The Bill proposes to split Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike (BBMP) into a maximum of seven city corporations in the Greater Bengaluru Area

title: 17,348 candidates to get degrees at 20th convocation of KSOU in Mysuru
content: Governor, Higher Education Minister to attend the convocation to be held on March 27, honorary doctorate to be conferred on PWD Minister Satish Jarkiholi, two others

title: Beyond the surface: Kerala’s enduring battle with dark skin bias
content: From the arts to everyday life, obsession with fair skin remains deeply entrenched, revealing a painful contrast to Kerala’s celebrated cultural and educational achievements

title: New Pamban Rail bridge is India’s first vertical lift bridge
content: The new Pamban Bridge’s Vertical Lift Girder Span is considered to be an engineering marvel, ensuring safe and efficient rail and marine traffic.

title: Prime Minister Modi to inaugurate new Pamban rail bridge on April 6
content: Southern Railway General Manager R.N. Singh told reporters that the Prime Minister would also address a public meeting in Rameswaram and flag off a new train between Rameswaram and Tambaram

title: D.K. Shivakumar has no role in honey-trap cases, claims Congress MLC Yathindra Siddaramaiah
content: He pointed out that neither Co-operation Minister K. N. Rajanna, who raised the issue in the legislature, nor any Congress leader had named the person, or persons, behind the cases of honey-trapping

title: Delhi HC permits jailed Baramulla MP Engineer Rashid to attend Parliament ‘in-custody’
content: Daily police escort from prison to Parliament; barred from using phones, internet, engaging with media while out of prison; NIA objects, citing national security threat by giving MP platform to voice opinions

title: Kerala Chief Secretary Sarada Muraleedharan decries colourism, triggers social debate on skin tone bias in progressive societies
content: In a poignant Facebook post, Sarada Muraleedharan spotlights inequity of skin tone bias against women in workplaces, domestic circles, hiring practices and professional appraisals

title: Congress moves privilege motion against MOS Rural Development for “false statement” on MGNREGS funds
content: A report published by The Hindu had pointed out the discrepancy in Minister of State for Rural Development Chandra Sekhar Pemmasani’s statement comparing the MGNREGS funds drawn by Tamil Nadu versus that by Uttar Pradesh and the ministry’s own data.

title: 72 new police stations, 23 fire and rescue services stations established in T.N. since 2021: CM Stalin
content: The Chief Minister, while responding to the queries of MLAs who sought new police and fire stations in various districts, assured them that the State government would consider their requests based on financial feasibility

title: Kerala HC against bankers’ panel’s proposal for moratorium, restructuring of loans of Wayanad landslide survivors
content: Division Bench orally observes that recommendation of State-level bankers’ committee is ‘not at all satisfying’

title: Congress MPs meet Speaker, raise issue of denial of opportunity to Rahul Gandhi in Lok Sabha
content: Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla asked Rahul Gandhi to follow the rules of procedure that members are expected to observe to uphold the dignity of the House

title: Kunal Kamra row: Mumbai Police refuses to comment on reports that comedian’s plea for time to join investigation denied
content: Kunal Kamra was summoned by the Mumbai Police on March 25, 2025; sources said the comedian has sought seven days to appear for the investigation

title: Punjab government's ₹2.36 lakh crore budget focuses on drug menace, health sector
content: Punjab Finance Minister Cheema unveils FY26 budget, focusing on anti-drug campaign, health sector improvements, and border security

title: Garbage pile-up at Fort Kochi beach: CPCB tells NGT that responsibility is on local authorities to ensure compliance
content: As per Solid Waste Management Rules, it is the duty of local authorities to facilitate construction, maintenance and operation of solid waste processing facilities and associated infrastructure, says CPCB report

title: After delays, GE Aerospace announces delivery of jet engines for Tejas LCA-Mk1A
content: The delivery of the 83 LCA-Mk1A jets to the Indian Air Force has been delayed due to delay in engine deliveries among other reasons

title: If Aaron Rodgers balks, what are Pittsburgh's prospects at quarterback?
content: the Pittsburgh Steelers have two quarterbacks on their roster as they await a decision from four-time NFL MVP Aaron Rodgers . despite the car wash of conversations, rodgers left Pittsburgh without agreeing to a deal . the former Jet and Packer is seemingly operating without a deadline even as his options narrow .

title: Sources: Nash to co-host on LeBron's podcast
content: leBron James is relaunching the "Mind the Game" podcast with a new basketball brain to pick at . two-time MVP Steve Nash will be his co-host on season 2 of the podcast . the first season of the episode was an immediate success, averaging 1.5 million views per episode .

title: Drake Maye gets No. 1 WR: Stefon Diggs immediately improves Patriots' offense
content: Stefon Diggs joins the new England Patriots on a three-year, $69 million contract . he's the best the Patriots have, a competitor and a worthy risk for the team to take . diggs' rehab is on course, and he will be ready for Week 1 .

title: Already 2-0, Dodgers are the center of the spectacle on Opening Day
content: Shohei Ohtani faced his worst fear: nothing to do and nowhere to go . he was addressing questions with expansive answers that elicited laughs from the media . this was his moment, too, back in Japan, five solid innings against the Cubs .

title: UFL threads: Breaking down the uniforms for each team
content: the united football league returns with a matchup between the Houston Roughnecks and the St. Louis Battlehawks . a merger between the USFL and XFL that was announced in September 2023 created the league . the defending champions will play at the Memphis Showboats at noon ET .

title: Women's Sweet 16 rankings: UConn is No. 1, USC holds tight at No. 4
content: uConn beat south Dakota State in the 2025 women's NCAA tournament . a torn ACL in her right knee is a season-ending injury . americans haven't reached the regionals, but there is plenty of movement in the rankings .

title: 2025 guide: Logos, coaches, key players and more
content: eight teams will play a 10-game season that culminates in a championship game on June 14 . the game will culminate with a game on march 28 between the St. Louis Battlehawks and Houston Roughnecks . here's a handy cheat sheet on the UFL basics .

title: Power Rankings: Pacers push toward playoffs, Nuggets hold on
content: in the East and west, the Phoenix Suns and the Dallas Mavericks are in a battle for the 10th seed . in the east, the Detroit Pistons still have their sights on a higher playoff seed while the play-in race for the no. 7 spot will be one to watch .

title: Who will win LaLiga: Atlético, Barcelona or Real Madrid? Title race talking points
content: all three teams have been league leaders since the turn of the year . all three have been reeled in by the chasing pack . barça play their rearranged match against Osasuna on Thursday . each of the top three will have 10 games left to play .

title: India terms US religious freedom report biased, calls panel 'entity of concern'
content: India has rejected the US Commission on International Religious Freedom (USCIRF) report as biased and politically motivated. The Ministry of External Affairs criticized the report for misrepresenting incidents and undermining India's democratic and tolerant society. New Delhi emphasized India's pluralistic framework and stated that the USCIRF should be considered an entity of concern.

title: One in five ultra-high net worth individuals want to settle abroad: Survey
content: One in five Ultra-HNIs in India plans to settle abroad for better investment opportunities, tax benefits, and connectivity, according to a Kotak Mahindra Bank survey. Ultra-HNIs are diversifying their assets globally, focusing on succession planning, healthcare, and education. EY highlights their global identity and increased spending on family offices and collectibles to preserve wealth and heritage.

title: 'Walked into GF's building': How Trump officials celebrated air strike
content: The strike was part of a broader US military operation initiated Friday afternoon following a directive from President Biden to restore freedom of navigation in the Red Sea and respond to Houthi aggression against commercial shipping.

title: Donald Trump makes it 'official': Elon Musk has become a friend of mine
content: President Donald Trump recently praised Tesla CEO Elon Musk, calling him a 'patriot' and acknowledging their friendship. Trump revoked a mandate for electric car sales and addressed ongoing attacks on Tesla cars, labeling attackers as 'high level terrorists' and vowing that police will find the culprits.

title: 'Since 2018, IPL's TV viewership has grown by 40%'
content: For JioStar, the newly minted behemoth, the ambition is clear: reach a billion viewers across platforms in 2025. “IPL always had the immense potential to go from where it was to unseen heights,” Sanjog Gupta, JioStar Sports CEO, told K Shriniwas Rao, Head of Content (Sports), Times Internet. The scale is staggering — 170 experts, 25+ feeds, 12 languages.  But behind the slick packaging is a larger story: of a media empire staking its claim on India's cultural centrepiece.

title: Trekkation is the new vacation
content: Trekking is increasingly becoming popular as a traveling alternative for many, offering an escape into nature's purest form. Trek The Himalayas, a leading trekking company in India, ensures safety with expert-guided treks and specialized medical kits, while promoting local tourism and providing premium trekking experiences.

title: 'We are at pains': What SC said on Allahabad HC's controversial ruling
content: The Supreme Court stayed the Allahabad high court's decision that 'grabbing the breast and breaking the pyjama string' was insufficient for rape charges. The apex court criticised the high court judge for insensitivity in the case involving two men charged with sexual assault of a minor. The case has been referred to the Chief Justice of the Allahabad High Court.

title: Musk’s 'What did you get done this week?' email may have run into tech problem
content: Elon Musk’s DOGE initiative to streamline government by having federal employees submit weekly work summaries has hit a snag with overwhelmed email inboxes causing delivery failures. More than 1 million federal workers initially responded, but conflicting instructions from agencies and high email volumes are creating issues. Alternatives, like NASA's app, are being tried. President Trump thanked Musk for his efforts.

title: Instant Scholar: Stephen Hawking’s PhD thesis on 'Properties of Expanding Universes'
content: ('Instant Scholar' is a Times of India initiative to make academic research accessible to a wider audience. If you are a Ph.D. scholar and would like to publish a summary of your research in this section, please share a summary and autherisation to publish it. For submission, and any question on this initiative, write to us at instantscholar@timesgroup.com)

title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk: 'No more loans to...' as DOGE fights loan fraud
content: Elon Musk supports the new SBA policy to prevent fraud involving stolen Social Security numbers, requiring applicants’ date of birth for direct loans. Measures include halting loans for those under 18 or over 120 years old, addressing past fraudulent cases and improving data integrity in federal loan programs.

title: Full leaked Signal chat of Trump officials sharing strike details released
content: The Atlantic has revealed a Signal group chat involving senior Trump administration officials, where Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth shared specific details of military operations against Yemen’s Houthis. The leak has prompted calls for resignations and an investigation. Trump downplayed the incident, while questions arise about the appropriateness of discussing military plans on Signal.

title: Preity Zinta reacts to Shreyas sacrificing his ton
content: Shreyas Iyer's selfless act of sacrificing his century for the team's success in Punjab Kings’ IPL opener against Gujarat Titans earned widespread praise. Co-owner Preity Zinta applauded Iyer's leadership and team-first mentality, stating, 'Some 97s are better than a hundred.' Iyer's 97-run knock and strategic decision helped PBKS achieve an imposing total and secured the Player of the Match award.

title: Paul Bissonnette slams Oilers’ costly blunder for letting $9M star go
content: The Edmonton Oilers’ decision not to match offer sheets from the St. Louis Blues for Philip Broberg and Dylan Holloway is under scrutiny. As both players excel in St. Louis, contributing significantly to the Blues' playoff push, Oilers fans and analysts are questioning if letting these rising stars go was a costly mistake that could impact their Stanley Cup prospects.

title: Solar eclipse 2025: When and where to watch in North America
content: Skygazers in the western Northern Hemisphere can witness a partial solar eclipse on March 29, 2025. The celestial event will be visible in various parts of North America, Europe, Asia, and Africa. The eclipse will peak at 6:47 a.m. EDT. This event is a follow-up to the 'ring of fire' eclipse in October 2024.

title: Kunal Kamra row: What's the road ahead for 'liberal' Uddhav Thackeray?
content: Uddhav Thackeray, facing political challenges after parting ways with BJP, stands his ground amidst controversy involving comedian Kunal Kamra. His decision to align with Congress and NCP in 2019 showcased a significant ideological shift. Despite setbacks, some believe Uddhav’s inclusive secular image could potentially reinvent him as a national leader in opposition to BJP.

title: 'I was padded up, when Dhoni came ... ,' reveals Ashwin
content: Ravichandran Ashwin described the overwhelming atmosphere when MS Dhoni came out to bat in the 19th over of Chennai Super Kings' match against Mumbai Indians. Ashwin noted the love Dhoni has earned, experiencing the reception from the CSK dugout for the first time. Despite the tense match situation, Dhoni's arrival captivated everyone.

title: Pakistan not invited for Azlan Shah Cup because of 'outstanding debt'
content: The Azlan Shah Cup organizers have not invited Pakistan due to an outstanding debt from a previous event. Pakistani officials are working to resolve the issue. Despite the strong hockey ties between Pakistan and Malaysia, the financial matter has caused complications. This situation impacts Pakistan's participation, while defending champions Japan will also miss the tournament due to other commitments.

title: US aerospace giant delivers 1st engine for much-delayed Tejas Mark-1A fighter
content: Hindustan Aeronautics (HAL) is set to accelerate production of the Tejas Mark-1A fighters following the delayed delivery of the first of 99 engines from GE. With finalizing integrations and increasing production lines, the IAF aims to bolster its fighter fleet, which is critically undermanned.

title: Amid Eknath Shinde row, Kamra takes shot at T-Series for 'being a stooge'
content: Comedian Kunal Kamra criticizes T-Series for disabling his standup special 'Naya Bharat' over a parody song deemed a copyright violation. The controversy escalated with vandalism by Shiv Sena activists and political disputes, with Kamra vowing not to apologize or back down despite facing legal action.

title: 'Just a trailer': Karni Sena on vandalising SP MP's house over Rana Sanga remark
content: Karni Sena leader Mahipal Makrana warned that the vandalism at MP Ramji Lal Suman’s house in Agra is just a warning, amid outrage over Suman’s controversial remarks on Rajput warrior Rana Sanga. The remarks have stirred protests and legal actions, with Rajput groups demanding action, as political figures, including Dimple Yadav, condemn the violence.

title: Sunaina says Hrithik was very silent during his illness: Top 5 Ent news
content: Bollywood is buzzing with news as Sana Raees Khan shares how she got Aryan Khan bail, while Salman Khan flaunts his Rs 1.97 crore watch inspired by the Indian flag and Salim Khan's legacy. Also notable, Hrithik Roshan's silence during illness and Sunaina Roshan's reaction, along with Kumar's lucrative Mumbai apartment sale.

title: 'No namaz on roads & rooftops': Sambhal admin issues guidelines for Eid
content: Ahead of Alvida Juma and Eid-ul-Fitr, a peace committee meeting in Sambhal, UP, directed that prayers be held inside mosques and Eidgah, not on streets or rooftops. Loudspeaker permissions were denied, and officials assured that electricity and water issues would be resolved. The festival schedule includes Alvida Juma on March 28, Navratras from March 30, and Eid-ul-Fitr on March 31. Authorities pledged strict enforcement of guidelines.

title: AIADMK says no tie-up with BJP, but keeps door ajar after top brass meet
content: AIADMK's Edappadi K Palaniswami dismisses talks of an alliance with the BJP, stating he will consider alliances only after election dates are announced. His meeting with Amit Shah focused on state issues, not election strategies, emphasizing continuity in AIADMK's ideology and decisions based on circumstances.

title: Honeytrap issue rocks Karnataka, 'procedural constraints' put Congress in a spot
content: Bengaluru's Cooperation Minister K N Rajanna submitted a petition to Home Minister G Parameshwara after alleging politicians were honeytrapped. He denied judges were involved and clarified his statements were misquoted. Home Minister Parameshwara said further action requires Speaker UT Khader's directives, and any investigation would proceed independently without waiting for the Supreme Court's decision.

title: Rahul's 'not allowed to speak' claim gets Birla's 'maintain conduct' reply
content: Leader of opposition Rahul Gandhi further accused Lok Sabha speaker Om Birla of making an unsubstantiated remark and not allowing him to respond, leading to an adjournment of the House. Gandhi expressed frustration over being consistently prevented from speaking in the Lok Sabha, particularly about the Kumbh Mela and unemployment.

title: Dodgers vs Rangers: Where to watch Shohei Ohtani’s face off against Jack Leiter
content: The 2025 MLB Spring Training will showcase a thrilling game between the Texas Rangers and Los Angeles Dodgers on March 6 at Camelback Ranch. Fans are excited about the pitching duel between Shohei Ohtani and Jack Leiter. Viewers can watch the game on the Rangers Sports Network, Victory+ Streaming Service, and MLB.TV.

title: Delhi HC allows MP Engineer Rashid to attend Parliament proceedings
content: The Delhi high court has allowed J&K's Baramulla Lok Sabha MP Engineer Rashid, arrested in a 2017 terror-funding case, to attend the ongoing Parliament session in-custody. Rashid, who won as an Independent candidate, will return to jail after daily Parliament proceedings until April 4. Rashid has been in Tihar Jail since 2019 under charges involving Pakistan-based militants.

title: Messi-led Argentina to visit India in October
content: Lionel Messi and the Argentine national team will visit India in October for an international friendly, announced by the AFA. This visit is part of the team's global promotional efforts and aims to strengthen their presence in significant markets like India and Singapore.

title: Why Sensex plunged over 700 points - top 5 reasons
content: Stock market today: BSE Sensex and Nifty50, the Indian equity benchmark indices, snapped their winning streak on Thursday to close lower. While BSE Sensex went below 78,000, Nifty50 gave up 23,500 level.

title: Watch: Rohit Sharma captains boat in Jamnagar
content: During a team bonding session in Jamnagar, Rohit Sharma was seen steering a boat with teammate Tilak Varma and support staff. Mumbai Indians, after a poor start in IPL 2025, took a break ahead of their next game. Skipper Hardik Pandya is expected to return, providing a crucial boost, but concerns remain about Jasprit Bumrah’s availability.

title: RCB player uses Virat Kohli's perfume without asking - WATCH
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru players celebrated their IPL 2025 opening win against Kolkata Knight Riders with lighthearted dressing room activities. Notably, Swastik Chikara amused teammates by using Virat Kohli's perfume without permission. RCB is preparing for their next match against Chennai Super Kings on Friday. RCB's next match is set for Friday against Chennai Super Kings.

title: Why Kohli, Dhoni facing criticism after Iyer's selfless act
content: Skipper Shreyas Iyer of Punjab Kings opted for team success over personal milestones in an IPL match, contrasting with past incidents involving Virat Kohli and MS Dhoni. Iyer, close to a hundred, encouraged his partner to keep hitting. This act has reignited discussions on individual achievements versus team-first mentality, sparking comparisons with Kohli and Dhoni's previous actions.

title: Congress's privilege motion against Amit Shah for 'maligning' Sonia Gandhi
content: The Congress party has moved a privilege motion against Union Home Minister Amit Shah for allegedly making defamatory remarks about Sonia Gandhi. Shah claimed the Prime Minister's National Relief Fund was controlled by a single family during UPA rule, while PM CARES under Modi's government is not. Jairam Ramesh termed Shah's statement as false and defamatory.

title: Amid row, Kunal Kamra takes swipe at 'Nirmala Tai' with satire video
content: Comedian Kunal Kamra shared a segment from his recent standup performance, indirectly criticizing Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman. An FIR was lodged against Kamra for allegedly defaming Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde. Despite the backlash and an apology refusal, Kamra remains defiant, with Eknath Shinde warning against the misuse of freedom of expression.

title: ‘Not even 1% of Rs 858 crore for central pollution plan spent’
content: Vishwa Mohan is Senior Editor at The Times of India. He writes on environment, climate change, agriculture, water resources and clean energy, tracking policy issues and climate diplomacy. He has been covering Parliament since 2003 to see how politics shaped up domestic policy and India’s position at global platform. Before switching over to explore sustainable development issues, Vishwa had covered internal security and investigative agencies for more than a decade.
